txt_en: "There are no seven wonders of the world in the eyes of a child. There are seven million. "
txt_cn: 在孩子们眼中，这世上不是只有七大奇迹，而是有七百万种奇迹。
author: Walt Streightiff

txt_en: A great obstacle to happiness is to expect too much happiness.
txt_cn: 获得幸福的一大障碍是对幸福期望太高。
author: Bernard de Fontenelle

txt_en: The verse of Qu Ping shines as bright as sun and moon, while palaces of Chu vanish like dreams at noon.
txt_cn: 屈平辞赋悬日月，楚王台榭空山丘。
author: 《江上吟》（许渊冲 译）

txt_en: The two things in life you are in total control over are your attitude and your effort.
txt_cn: 生活中你可以全权掌控的两件事：你的态度和你付出的努力。
author: Billy Cox

txt_en: True happiness is not attained through self-gratification, but through fidelity to a worthy purpose.
txt_cn: 真正的幸福不是通过自我满足获得的，而是来自于对有价值目标的忠诚。
author: Helen Keller

txt_en: Love is just a word until someone comes along and gives it meaning.
txt_cn: 爱不过是一个词而已，直到有一个人来到你面前，赋予它意义。
author: Paulo Coelho

txt_en: Green was the silence, wet was the light, the month of June trembled like a butterfly.
txt_cn: 寂静生碧色，黎明露华浓，六月似蝴蝶在颤动。
author: Pablo Neruda

txt_en: Storms make trees take deeper roots.
txt_cn: 暴风雨使得树木的根扎得更深。
author: Dolly Parton

txt_en: Passion makes the world go round. Love just makes it a safer place.
txt_cn: 热情使世界转动。爱让它成为一个更安全的地方。
author: Ice-T

txt_en: It is very simple to be happy, but it is very difficult to be simple.
txt_cn: 快乐很简单，但要做到简单却很困难。
author: Tagore

txt_en: If you spend your whole life waiting for the storm, you’ll never enjoy the sunshine.
txt_cn: 如果你一生都在等待暴风雨，你就永远不会享受阳光。
author: Morris West

txt_en: It is one thing to be clever and another to be wise.
txt_cn: 聪明和智慧是两码事。
author: George R.R. Martin

txt_en: We are never really happy until we try to brighten the lives of others.
txt_cn: 除非我们努力照亮别人的生活，否则我们永远不会真正快乐。
author: Helen Keller

txt_en: Wherever there is a human being, there is an opportunity for a kindness.
txt_cn: 哪里有人，哪里就有良善的机会。
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

txt_en: The real difficulty is to overcome how you think about yourself.
txt_cn: 真正的困难是克服你对自己的看法。
author: Maya Angelou

txt_en: The only limit to the height of your achievements is the reach of your dreams and your willingness to work hard for them.
txt_cn: 唯一限制你成就高度的，是你梦想的限度，以及为之努力的意愿。
author: Michelle Obama

txt_en: A loving heart is the beginning of all knowledge.
txt_cn: 一颗充满热爱的心是一切知识的起源。
author: Thomas Carlyle

txt_en: Neutral men are the devil's allies.
txt_cn: 中立的人是魔鬼的盟友。
author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

txt_en: Culture makes all men gentle.
txt_cn: 文化使人温文尔雅。
author: Menander

txt_en: Good judgment comes from experience, and a lot of that comes from bad judgment.
txt_cn: 正确的决断源自经验，而大部分经验源自错误的决断。
author: Will Rogers

txt_en: One benefit of Summer was that each day we had more light to read by.
txt_cn: 夏天的好处之一便是我们有更多的阳光来阅读。
author: Jeannette Walls

txt_en: Don't go through life, grow through life.
txt_cn: 不要此生匆匆过，但求每日都成长。
author: Eric Butterworth

txt_en: Conformity is the jailer of freedom and the enemy of growth.
txt_cn: 从众是羁押自由的狱卒，是阻碍进步的敌人。
author: John F. Kennedy

txt_en: Music is well said to be the speech of angels.
txt_cn: 音乐被赞为天使的语言。
author: Thomas Carlyle
